case_circumstances: On 4/22/11, the resident of room #207 at the above location heard a loud "pop" come from the next room, #209.  Shortly after the smoke alarm from room #209 went off.  Building staff responded to the room, found the door locked but not deadbolted, and opened the door using a building passkey.  Upon entry, they found the subject unresponsive on the bed with apparent gun shot wound to the head and a firearm next to her.  A permanent resident card was found amongst the subject's belongings, bearing the name Marcela Tamara Estodas De La Cruz with the date of birth of 12/5/1973 and a country of birth of Bolivia.
case_clothing_on_body: Black jacket made by "Utex Design"; Navy blue shirt made by "Faded Glory"; Navy blue "Levi" Jeans; White cotton underwear; Black and white striped neckerchief; black and white gloves
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
